text:
─Meguru, good job today.
You seemed to put in even more effort than usual?

Producer...!
You know, I felt like it was the final day, so I put in extra effort.

─Just earlier,
I was reading a fan letter from a new fan.

I thought that they might be watching...
So I wanted to do my best and show them a good performance!
I see, so the fan letters were the driving force.

It seems like working in a different
place than usual was a good stimulus.

I'll do my best so that more new
people can get to know Meguru.
...Alright, when I get home, I need to write replies...!
Haha, you're still full of energy!
